paper_abstract: We consider the problem of determining the maximum and the minimum number of upward planar orientations a maximal planar graph can have. We show that every n-vertex maximal planar graph has at least Omega*(1.189(n)) and at most O*(4(n)) upward planar orientations. Moreover, we show that there exist n-vertex maximal planar graphs having O*(2(n)) upward planar orientations and n-vertex maximal planar graphs having Omega*(2.599(n)) upward planar orientations. Further, we present bounds for the maximum and the minimum number of acyclic orientations a maximal planar graph can have. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the number of upward planar orientations of maximal planar graphs
